and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey Brin for a long time to come.''`` Eric Schmidt has clearly done an outstanding job leading Google for the last decade,'' adds Page. The results speak for themselves. There is no other CEO in the world that could have kept such headstrong founders so deeply involved and still run the business so brilliantly. Eric Schmidt is a tremendous leader, and I have learned innumerable lessons from him. His advice and efforts will be invaluable to me as I start in this new role. Google still has such incredible opportunity; we are only at the beginning, and I can't wait to get started. X FACTOR boss Simon Cowell is trying to entice Britain's top voiceover man to America. Booming Peter Dickson, 49, is familiar to millions of fans for telling nervous contestants: It's time... to face... the music! Now Simon Cowell wants him to deliver his sound on the talent show's American version from the autumn. Peter, who also does Britain's Got Talent, Family Fortunes, The Paul O'Grady Show,

Agriculture could help farmers recover from property damage and livestock losses due to weeks of snow and ice buildup.`` The amount of heavy snow we've received this winter is unprecedented,'' Kirsten Gillibrand said. Federal assistance is absolutely critical to helping these hardworking farm families recover. Farm Service Agency's emergency loans go to help supplement farmers' incomes after crop and livestock loss, pay to replace or repair of property, alleviate production costs and refinance debts.
